archimate:Principle.name: Pairwise
archimate:Principle.documentation: A direct relationship between exactly two Entities. Most relationships in the Sovrin ecosystem are Pairwise, even when one or both Entities are not Individuals. For example, business-to-business relationships are pairwise by default. A DID or a Public Key or a Service Endpoint is Pairwise if it is used exclusively in a Pairwise relationship. Compare with N-wise and Anywise.
